amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Railroad Passenger Corporation Office of Inspector General by $1 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the National Railroad Passenger Corporation Office of Inspector General by $1 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 295 (Roll no. 281).
